tool_description: Provisions and configures Kubernetes clusters on various cloud platforms with specified node configurations.

cluster_name.description: Name of the cluster to provision

cloud_provider.description: Cloud provider: aws, gcp, azure, on-premise

error_messages: Invalid cloud provider: Use one of [aws, gcp, azure, on-premise].
Insufficient quota: Cloud provider quota exceeded for requested resources.
Invalid instance type: Specified node_instance_type not available in region.
Unsupported Kubernetes version: Check available versions for selected provider.
Network CIDR conflict: Specified CIDR conflicts with existing networks.
Region not available: Selected region not supported by cloud provider.
Autoscaling configuration error: max_nodes required when enable_autoscaling is true.
usage: Provide cluster_name, cloud_provider, node_count, node_instance_type, and region. Optionally configure kubernetes_version, enable_autoscaling, max_nodes, and network_cidr.

cluster_id.description: Unique identifier of the provisioned cluster

kubeconfig.description: Base64 encoded kubeconfig for cluster access
